default: 125g/4½oz clams, rinsed in clean cold water

steps: Put the garlic, white wine, clams and boiling water into a medium saucepan, cover with a lid and cook for five minutes, or until all the clams have opened. Drain and discard any that haven't opened.
Toss the clams with the cooked tagliatelle, place in a bowl and sprinkle with parsley, to serve.
title: Tagliatelle with garlic clams
